meanings.definition: A device that can supply power to multiple devices simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The multipower kept all my gadgets charged at the same time.
meanings.sent2: I bought a multipower to charge my phone, tablet, and laptop together.
meanings.sent3: The multipower was like a superhero team, ensuring all my devices stayed powered up.
meanings.sent4: The multipower was a lifesaver during the power outage, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: With the multipower, I never had to worry about running out of battery again.

meanings.definition: Having multiple sources of power or influence.
meanings.sent1: She was a multipower figure in the industry, with connections everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was due to its multipower strategy in the market.
meanings.sent3: His multipower status made him the go-to person for advice and support.
meanings.sent4: The team became a multipower force, dominating the competition effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Her multipower presence commanded respect and admiration from all who knew her.
